Package morusmath

Class Matrix

java.lang.Object
morusmath.Matrix
public class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object
Matrix

public class Matrix

Class for matrix operations. It is recommended to validate matrixes with appropriate method from this class.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Matrix​(int precision)
    Matrix

    public Matrix(int precision)

    Returns instance of Matrix and sets given precision.

    • matrixIsSquare

      public boolean matrixIsSquare​(java.lang.String[][] matrix)
      matrixIsSquare

      public boolean matrixIsSquare(String[][] matrix)

      Returns true if matrix is square, false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      matrix - matrix to be compared.
      Returns:
      true if matrix is square, false otherwise.

    • matrixesHaveTheSameSize

      public boolean matrixesHaveTheSameSize​(java.lang.String[][] matrixA, java.lang.String[][] matrixB)
      matrixesHaveTheSameSize

      public boolean matrixesHaveTheSameSize(String[][] matrixA, String[][] matrixB)

      Returns true if matrixes have the same size, false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      matrixA - first matrix to be compared.
      matrixB - second matrix to be compared.
      Returns:
      true if matrixes have the same size, false otherwise.

    • putMatrixToString

      public java.lang.String putMatrixToString​(java.lang.String[][] matrix)
      putMatrixToString

      public String putMatrixToString(String[][] matrix)

      Puts matrix to String. Mainly for demonstration purposes.
      Parameters:
      matrix - matrix to processed.
      Returns:
      matrix as String.

    • transposeMatrix

      public java.lang.String[][] transposeMatrix​(java.lang.String[][] matrix)
      transposeMatrix

      public String[][] transposeMatrix(String[][] matrix)

      Returns transposed matrix without checking cell content.
      Parameters:
      matrix - matrix to be transposed.
      Returns:
      transposed matrix.

    • validateMatrix

      public void validateMatrix​(java.lang.String[][] matrix) throws morusmath.exceptions.MatrixException
      validateMatrix

      public void validateMatrix(String[][] matrix)

      Validates given matrix. Cell content is not checked.
      Parameters:
      matrix - matrix to be validated.
      Throws:
      morusmath.exceptions.MatrixException - error throwed if matrix is null, row size or column size is 0 or row lengths are not equal.

    • validateMatrix

      public void validateMatrix​(java.lang.String[][] matrix, java.lang.String prefix) throws morusmath.exceptions.MatrixException
      validateMatrix

      public void validateMatrix(String[][] matrix, String prefix)

      Validates given matrix and adds specified prefix to the beginning of error message. Cell content is not checked.
      Parameters:
      matrix - matrix to be validated.
      prefix - value to be added to the beginning of error message.
      Throws:
      morusmath.exceptions.MatrixException - error throwed if matrix is null, row size or column size is 0 or row lengths are not equal.
